Docs.summary: A Class representing an ExpressRouteAuthorization along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct an from an instance of using the GetExpressRouteAuthorizationResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetExpressRouteAuthorization method.
